name: Racial Heritage
text: The blood of a non-human ancestor flows in your veins.
benefit: Choose another humanoid race. You count as both human and that race for any effects related to race. For example, if you choose dwarf, you are considered both a human and a dwarf for the purpose of taking traits, feats, how spells and magic items affect you, and so on.
mythicText: Your racial heritage mingles with your mythic power to become more pronounced.
mythicBenefit: You gain a single racial trait of your choice from the race you picked when you took non-mythic Racial Heritage. That racial trait can’t modify your size or ability scores. You also gain the racial language of the race (if any) if you don’t already know it. For races with multiple racial languages, you gain all of them.
text_zh: 除了人类之外，还有其他先祖的血脉在你体内流淌。
benefit_zh: 选择一种其他的类人种族。在判断任何与种族相关的效果时，你被同时时为该种族和人类。例如，如果你选择矮人，那么在选择背景特性，专长，法术与魔法物品对你的作用等等内容时，同时被认为是人类和矮人。
mythicText_zh: 当你的神话力量与自身血脉交织在一起时，它会变得更为明显。
mythicBenefit_zh: 你获得1个种族特性（racial trait），这个特性来自你在选取非神话版远古血脉专长时选择的种族。该种族特性无法调整你的属性或体型。如果你还未掌握该种族的种族语言（如果有的话），那么你会获得该语言。对于获取复数种族语言的种族来说，你能够获取全部对应语言。
